lead_paragraph: The Association of American Railroads said t 410,249 carloads of crude oil were carried across the U.S. last year, a drop of 17 percent from 493,126 carloads in 2014.

headline.print_headline: Fewer Carloads of Crude Oil Travel Across United States
headline.main: Fewer Carloads of Crude Oil Travel Across United States

snippet: The Association of American Railroads said t 410,249 carloads of crude oil were carried across the U.S. last year, a drop of 17 percent from 493,126 carloads in 2014.
abstract: Assn of American Railroads reports carloads of crude oil carried across United States declined 17 percent in 2015 to 410,249, from 493,126 in 2014.
